headline: Software to run car washes moving to a monthly subscription model

# Hit your car wash membership goals
Rinsed integrates directly with your POS, giving you the tools to grow memberships, reduce churn, and keep customers coming back.
[Get a Demo](https://www.rinsed.com/</demo>)
![Solutions that fuel success](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/67a4021a184649b448731f26_Resize_Hero_2.png)
## Trusted by over 3,000 car washes

## Solutions That Fuel Success
![Learn more about CRM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ec923d6a4e7f406e96850_Frame%20\(64\).webp)![Learn more about CRM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670eebd3b75f51cebab534b2_image%20\(11\).webp)![Learn more about CRM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/6717a7b8c845f1693cd35dca_Frame%2080%20\(4\).png)
The Car Wash CRM
Drive membership growth and loyalty
The Car Wash CRM integrates directly with your POS and website, so all of your customer data, marketing tools, and business metrics are in one easy-to-use platform.
Minimize churn and increase LTV
Multiply your members and retail customers
Sell memberships online with just a click
Access all of your POS data at your fingertips
[Learn More](https://www.rinsed.com/</the-car-wash-crm>)
![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee9214fc9decd61f3e480_Rectangle%20797.svg)![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee92185bb2e2f6fc6f3c7_Vector%201.svg)
![Learn more about CRM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ec923d6a4e7f406e96850_Frame%20\(64\).webp)![Learn more about Salespath](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670fcfbddf0f335523ccb7d6_image%209%20\(1\).webp)![Learn more about Salespath](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/6717a7c83af8617d1dd2ef1d_Frame%2081.png)
Salespath
Increase membership signups in the driveway
Salespath brings visibility to the driveway, providing insights into each sales moment to improve the sales process & increase conversions. Works with any POS.‍
Maximize conversions in the driveway
Engage through gamification
Record audio of every sales pitch
Access sales stats in real-time
[Learn More](https://www.rinsed.com/</salespath>)
![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee9214fc9decd61f3e480_Rectangle%20797.svg)![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee92185bb2e2f6fc6f3c7_Vector%201.svg)
![Learn more about CRM](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ec923d6a4e7f406e96850_Frame%20\(64\).webp)![Support Agent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/67a39293a023c658eeeeb517_Support%20Agent%20-%20Product%20-%20Background.png)![Support Agent](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/67a39293d71ca66f2888ef39_Suppport%20Agent%20-%20Product.png)
Support Agent
Improve your customer experience
Support Agent is an AI-powered phone support solution that handles customer requests automatically,so you don’t have to.‍‍
24/7 Phone Coverage
Automatically handle customer requests & FAQs
Connect with customers in 16+ languages
Reduce expenses while keeping support reliable.
[Learn More](https://www.rinsed.com/</support-agent>)
![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee9214fc9decd61f3e480_Rectangle%20797.svg)![Rinsed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/670ee92185bb2e2f6fc6f3c7_Vector%201.svg)
## Increase your bottom line
### Get more out of your POS and website without changing or adding any hardware
30%
#### Increase in Driveway Conversion Rate
across Salespath customers
17%
#### Revenue Growth
in the first year for CRM customers
90%
#### of Membership Requests Automated
across all Rinsed customers 
## Learn how car washes like yours use Rinsed
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff9d38d79a88582fe3939a6/64ab3e74540e81eb4c63fbcb_play-button.svg)
"Rinsed pays for itself. It's in the numbers."
— Justin Young, VP Marketing, Splash Car Wash
[Get a Demo](https://www.rinsed.com/</demo>)
### MEMBERSHIP MANAGED
## Rinsed helps customers manage over 7,500,000 active members
[Get a Demo](https://www.rinsed.com/</demo>)
0
## Why car washes trust Rinsed
![Car Wash Miami](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648accd4b48d12dd2a9e0bde_6489596ba9277d495f51d0ed_logo-13.webp)
“Rinsed has been instrumental as El Car Wash has grown from 7 to 20+ locations in the South Florida area. Using their tools has helped us better engage with customers, grow our membership base, and reduce churn. Rinsed has helped us modernize the way we manage and grow our business."
![Justin Landau](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648acd54b48d12dd2a9e8f72_avatar-1.webp)
Justin Landau
CEO, El Car Wash
![Splash Car Wash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/65931ac21d30e3c3c88d9d7c_splash.webp)
"The industry leaders use Rinsed, and we want to be an industry leader. Rinsed pays for itself, it's in the numbers. We've seen over a 7x return on our investment."
![Justin Young](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/65931b2676ad0794ac5945eb_justin%20young%202.webp)
Justin Young
VP of Marketing, Splash Car Wash
![Big Dan’s Car Wash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/67a114b294b0501e036592af_download%20\(1\).jpeg)
"As a training consultant for nearly 10 years, I have helped customers grow their membership base and SalePath is the best tool I have come across to aid in that growth."
![Jonathan McCrady](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/67a114cf5caefd538fb941bb_IMG_3189.jpeg)
Jonathan McCrady
Director of Training
![Breeze Thru Car Wash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648acfbb93490a6209c2f1ac_64895969125774c49eab9d87_logo-10.webp)
“Using Rinsed has brought our unlimited wash pass memberships churn rate down significantly, and that's helped with the bottom line big time. We've recovered a lot of revenue since using Rinsed.”
![Wade Keith](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ad03c9a41d5d78b926c32_avatar-3.webp)
Wade Keith
Brand Manager, Breeze Thru Car Wash
![GO Car Wash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ace9224d7794b98c43897_6489596b8bfc7298660b5cbf_logo-4.webp)
“I've been washing cars for over 20 years, and there is no one close to the capabilities of Rinsed. The secret sauce is the simplified checkout process. It lets us keep more members by reducing churn, and also sell more memberships online.
![Brett Meinberg](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/6593208baf078b1674e94a28_brett.webp)
Brett Meinberg
COO, GO Car Wash
![Rocket Carwash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ad0c693c0bc839ddab9c6_64895968d1a77b591a1e452e_logo-2.webp)
“Rinsed has transformed the way we leverage data and given us the technology to increase new member signups and reduce churn. The Rinsed team works with us to understand our business and provides the tools our leaders need to grow the business effectively.”
![Blake Newman](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ad210ca83e0420d8a902a_avatar-4.webp)
Blake Newman
COO, Rocket Car Wash
![GAS N WASH](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae1e9be0209d4f34b7342_logo-1.webp)
“Rinsed simplified our reporting process, as well as gave us the platform to skyrocket our online presence. If you are looking for a reliable platform with modification ability to your specific needs, Rinsed is where to look.”
Justin Luka
Director Carwash, Gas N Wash
![Coates Car Care](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae2b4cc9c908a8a483c84_logo-2.webp)
The Rinsed team has been great with taking certain things that I am looking for and offering me ways to accomplish them. Our Rinsed dashboard is my go-to for any metrics I am monitoring, and it paints a great picture of our company's overall performance on both site and corporate levels.”
![James Coates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae2d992d1619b4e858910_avatar-6.webp)
James Coates
COO, Coates Car Care
![Magnolia Car Holdings](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae44290b754e37d8e1a5d_logo-3.webp)
“Since the implementation of Rinsed, I am able to create customer journeys based on membership, manage customer accounts, and all customer interactions are housed within one platform. The platform is easy to manage and Rinsed is a valuable partner to our business. I really enjoy working with the Rinsed team and continuing to build the partnership between our companies.”
![Meaghan Perry-Price](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae429c424132d4e269203_avatar-7.webp)
Meaghan Perry-Price
Head of CRM, Magnolia Wash Holdings
![Shine Time Super Wash](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae4b3208b40224922e918_logo-4.webp)
“Rinsed not only helps us achieve our goals, but more importantly, Rinsed helps us define and measure our performance, so we as managers can make better goal-setting decisions. Rinsed is a competitive advantage for us, and we are able to provide a much better customer experience because of it.”
![Mike Reiney](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/648aca1fa9f037e578459a65/648ae4b653618b1de3f3a7a1_avatar-8.webp)
Mike Reiney
CMO/CRO, Shine Time Super Wash
## Grow and retain your car wash membership revenue today
### Rinsed integrates directly with your POS and website, so all of your customer data, marketing tools, and business metrics are in one easy-to-use platform.
[Get a Demo](https://www.rinsed.com/</demo>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Rinsed**

**Website:** [Rinsed](https://www.rinsed.com)  
**Founded:** 2019  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W21  
**Team Size:** ~50 employees  
**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel

---

Rinsed is streamlining operations for car wash owners with a cloud-based software platform that facilitates membership management and builds customer loyalty. Since its founding in 2019, Rinsed has helped thousands of car washes grow their businesses through software solutions that address features vital for operational success.

### Mission

Rinsed’s core mission is straightforward: to empower car wash businesses by transitioning them toward a monthly subscription model that simplifies customer relationships and enhances operational efficiency.

### Tagline

Rinsed integrates seamlessly with point-of-sale (POS) systems, equipping car washes with tools to grow memberships and reduce churn, ensuring that customers keep coming back.

### Products

1. **The Car Wash CRM:** A centralized hub that integrates all essential business functions, allowing car washes to streamline operations, boost customer engagement, and facilitate membership sales.
   
2. **Salespath:** This product enhances the driveway sales process, offering tools for real-time sales tracking and engagement strategies that increase conversion rates.
   
3. **Support Agent:** An AI-powered support solution that manages customer inquiries around the clock, reducing the need for human intervention while catering to customers in multiple languages.

---

### Market Presence

Rinsed is already trusted by over 3,000 car washes across North America. The company emphasizes measurable success, boasting metrics that show a 30% increase in driveway conversion rates and a 17% growth in revenue for their CRM customers.

### Why Choose Rinsed?

A plethora of customer testimonials reinforces Rinsed’s value proposition. Notable clients like Splash Car Wash and Breeze Thru Car Wash report substantial ROI and enhanced operational efficiencies after implementing Rinsed. Quotes from industry leaders echo the sentiment that Rinsed isn’t just a tool; it’s a business partner that contributes significantly to growth and customer retention efforts.

---

**Conclusion**

For car wash operators looking to modernize their business and tap into the recurring revenue model, Rinsed offers a compelling suite of products designed for ease of integration and impactful results. If your goal is to optimize membership management and drive customer loyalty, Rinsed is worth a closer look. 

---

Get started on transforming your car wash operations today by scheduling a demo on their website.
